name: Roo.SplitBar.BasicLayoutAdapter
desc:
Default Adapter. It assumes the splitter and resizing element are not positioned
elements and only gets/sets the width of the element. Generally used for table based layouts.

methods.name: setElementSize
methods.desc: Called after drag operations to set the size of the resizing element.

params.name: onComplete
params.desc: A function to be invoked when resizing is complete

methods.name: getElementSize
methods.desc: Called before drag operations to get the current size of the resizing element.
